slope_performance_test.c

00001 #include <math.h>
00002 #include <stdio.h>
00003 #include <stdlib.h>
00004 #include <sys/time.h>
00005 
00018 #define NUM_TESTS 5
00019 #define MAX_SLOPE 100
00020 #define LENGTH 100
00021 
00022 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00023 {
00024   if(argc == 1)
00025     {
00026       printf("Usage %s <iterations>\n", argv[0]);
00027       printf(" iterations is the number of slopes to generate\n");
00028       return -1;
00029     }
00030 
00031   char* test_names[NUM_TESTS];
00032   test_names[0] = "Trigonometric Test #1";
00033   test_names[1] = "Trigonometric Test #2";
00034   test_names[2] = "Identity Test";
00035   test_names[3] = "Countdown Identity Test";
00036   test_names[4] = "Empty Loop Test";
00037   
00038   int num_slopes = atoi(argv[1]);
00039   double* slopes = malloc(num_slopes * sizeof(double));
00040   int i;
00041 
00042   for(i = 0; i < num_slopes; i++)
00043     {
00044       slopes[i] = MAX_SLOPE * rand() / (RAND_MAX + 1.0);
00045     }
00046 
00047   printf("Generated %d random slope%c\n", num_slopes,
00048          num_slopes == 1 ? '\0' : 's');
00049 
00050   long times[NUM_TESTS];
00051   int test = 0;
00052   struct timeval start_time, end_time;
00053 
00054   for(test = 0; test < NUM_TESTS; test++)
00055     {
00056       gettimeofday(&start_time, NULL);
00057       printf("Running test: \"%s\"\n", test_names[test]);
00058       switch(test)
00059         {
00060         case 0:
00061           for(i = 0; i < num_slopes; i++)
00062             {
00063               double theta = atan(slopes[i]);
00064               double x = LENGTH * cos(theta);
00065               double y = LENGTH * sin(theta);
00066             }
00067           break;
00068         case 1:
00069           for(i = 0; i < num_slopes; i++)
00070             {
00071               double theta = atan(slopes[i]);
00072               double x = LENGTH * cos(theta);
00073               double y = slopes[i] * x;
00074             }
00075           break;
00076         case 2:
00077           for(i = 0; i < num_slopes; i++)
00078             {
00079               double x = LENGTH / sqrt(1 + slopes[i] * slopes[i]);
00080               double y = slopes[i] * x;
00081             }
00082           break;
00083         case 3:
00084           for(i = num_slopes - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00085             {
00086               double x = LENGTH / sqrt(1 + slopes[i] * slopes[i]);
00087               double y = slopes[i] * x;
00088             }
00089           break;
00090         case 4:
00091           for(i = 0; i < num_slopes; i++)
00092             {
00093             }
00094           break;
00095         }
00096       gettimeofday(&end_time, NULL);
00097       times[test] = (end_time.tv_usec - start_time.tv_usec +
00098                      (end_time.tv_sec - start_time.tv_sec) * 1000000);
00099     }
00100 
00101   free(slopes);
00102 
00103   int fastest_index = 0;
00104   for(i = 1; i < NUM_TESTS; i++)
00105     {
00106       if(times[i] < times[fastest_index])
00107         {
00108           fastest_index = i;
00109         }
00110     }
00111         
00112   printf("The fastest time was %s\n", test_names[fastest_index]);
00113         
00114   printf("The times for each test were:\n");
00115   for(i = 0; i < NUM_TESTS; i++)
00116     {
00117       long delta = times[i] - times[fastest_index];
00118       double factor = (double)times[i] / (double)times[fastest_index];
00119       printf("  %dus ", times[i]);
00120       printf("[+%dus] ", delta);
00121       if(factor != 1)
00122         {
00123           printf("(%0.4f) ", factor);
00124         }
00125       printf("%s\n", test_names[i]);
00126     }
00127   return 0;
00128 }
